name: Fill Line Puzzle - Mind Games
description:
This is a fun and challenging bridge building game.

I believe you like this game.

Connect the matching colors to the pipe to create a bridge. Pair all colors and cover the entire board. Use the new route to cross the two pipes and solve each puzzle!

Race against time in time trial mode. The gameplay is simple and relaxed, to challenges and fanaticism, and somewhere in between. How you play depends on you.
